# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and high quality, I estimate its value to be well above $12000. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I propose a special introductory price of $15000. This offer includes comprehensive support and a 1-year warranty. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions. I look forward to potentially working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
